content: may i borrow this please lorraine p waitman may 2019/rev sept 2021 an easy quick pattern for a long triangular shawl that is nice for a skein with a long color change or long gradation it will also work up nicely in a solid color yarn i first knit this pattern in a dk weight yarn schoppel gradient 284 yards per 100 gram ball using a us9 needle the second time i used a bulky yarn berrocco estiva 336 yds 150 gram ball on a us10 5 needle both resulted in a lovely drapey fabric yardage dk 284 yards or bulky yarn 336 yards gauge not a major factor find a fabric you like that
